definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: These windows are 9 inches thick. If they go, it's sayonara in two microseconds.
sentences.chinese: 窗的厚度是9寸，要是破裂，所有的人轉眼就沒命。

sentences.english: Most of crucian carp, lives in in running water wild.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是鯽魚，沒命地在湍急的流水中撒野。

sentences.english: If they had given up searching, I would have died.
sentences.chinese: 如果當時他們放棄了搜尋，那麼我就沒命了。

sentences.english: He was hit by several bullets, and almost died.
sentences.chinese: 他身上被打中了幾槍，差一點就沒命了。

sentences.english: With that man's help, Tianlin ran desperately for the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 在那人的幫助下，天林沒命地朝醫院跑去。

sentences.english: Sucre steps on an explosive mine and cannot lift his foot without it being blown off.
sentences.chinese: 蘇克雷踩到了一個地雷上，如果擡腳他就沒命了。

sentences.english: The fever,if not brought down,might and would kill the young fellow.
sentences.chinese: 要是不及時退燒，年輕人就沒命了。
